body_text:
This contains a very early rough draft of the protocol we'd like to use between the SHIELD system add-on and Normandy. Since this protocol has implications on our admin UI and data models I figured now would be a good time to at least think about the shape of it, even if our first task is to replace self-repair as it is now.
@mythmon Feedback?

title: Add docs and a rough draft of the final SHIELD protocol.
body:
This contains a very early rough draft of the protocol we'd like to use between the SHIELD system add-on and Normandy. Since this protocol has implications on our admin UI and data models I figured now would be a good time to at least think about the shape of it, even if our first task is to replace self-repair as it is now.

@mythmon Feedback?
